posts.title: How I built this site
posts.abstract: I originally migrated this portfolio site back in 2023, and since then it's evolved quite a bit. Recently I migrated from Create React App to Next.js and made some major upgrades in the process.

posts.title: AI Assistants- Reshaping the Human Experience
posts.abstract: The advent of advanced AI assistants powered by large language models is revolutionizing human-machine interaction across industries, while necessitating responsible development that balances capability augmentation and innovation against ethical risks.

featured.title: Deep Dives in Code- Exploring Advanced Concepts
featured.abstract: Coding got you down? Supercharge your skills with advanced concepts like self-changing code (metaprogramming) and multitasking programs (multithreading).  "Hello world" to world domination in no time (almost).
